project.component: { "keyToString": { "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.git.test_publisher.test_publisher_noop_without_git_repo.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.llm.test_runner.test_llm_runner_constructs_request.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.rag.test_indexer.test_rag_indexer_builds_contexts.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.test_config.test_load_config_returns_defaults_when_missing.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.test_orchestrator.test_run_init_creates_readme_with_quickstart.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.test_orchestrator.test_run_init_refuses_to_overwrite_existing_readme.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.test_repo_scanner.test_scan_builds_manifest_with_roles_and_language.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for tests.test_repo_scanner.test_scan_rejects_missing_directory.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_builder.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in tests.executor": "Run", "Python.test.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager.252": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SONARLINT_PRECOMMIT_ANALYSIS": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "task/improvements", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true" } }

task.summary: - Introduced configuration-aware prompt styling so readme.style toggles between concise and comprehensive output; list-heavy sections now trim appropriately and expose metadata for templates (docgen/prompting/builder.py:200, tests/prompting/test_builder.py:115). - Taught the orchestrator to honour .docgen.yml ci.watched_globs, short-circuiting updates when no watched files changed, and ensured prompt builders inherit per-run style/ template overrides without reusing stale instances (docgen/orchestrator.py:68, tests/test_orchestrator.py:214). - Added a GitHub Actions reference workflow plus documentation for self-hosted runners, covering installation, diff-base resolution, and optional committing of README changes (docs/ci/docgen-update.yml:1, docs/ci/github- actions.md:1). - Updated the spec and feature checklist to reflect the new CI integration, style presets, and watched-glob behaviour (spec/spec.md:55, spec/feature_checklist.md:69).

- Enhanced the pipeline to understand project execution paths and infrastructure cues: new entrypoint and pattern analyzers emit run commands/quick‑start hints, the prompt builder weaves them into Features/Quick Start, and the RAG index now caches embeddings incrementally instead of rebuilding from scratch (docgen/analyzers/entrypoints.py, docgen/analyzers/patterns.py, docgen/prompting/builder.py, docgen/rag/indexer.py, docgen/rag/store.py, related tests). - Hardened post-processing and quality gates with badge insertion, local link validation, and README scorecards persisted under .docgen/scorecard.json; updated publisher/config/CLI plumbing adds dry-run support, PR labelling/ updating, and richer template overrides (docs/templates + packs) (docgen/postproc/badges.py, docgen/postproc/links.py, docgen/postproc/scorecard.py, docgen/orchestrator.py, docgen/cli.py, docgen/git/publisher.py, docgen/ config.py, docs/ci/github-actions.md). - Documented and marked off Phases 7 & 8 in the spec/checklist while expanding coverage with new analyzer, postproc, CLI, publisher, and config tests (spec/spec.md, spec/feature_checklist.md, tests/analyzers/ test_entrypoints.py, tests/analyzers/test_patterns.py, tests/postproc/test_postproc.py, tests/test_cli.py, tests/test_config.py, tests/test_orchestrator.py, tests/git/test_publisher.py).

MESSAGE.value: - Introduced configuration-aware prompt styling so readme.style toggles between concise and comprehensive output; list-heavy sections now trim appropriately and expose metadata for templates (docgen/prompting/builder.py:200, tests/prompting/test_builder.py:115). - Taught the orchestrator to honour .docgen.yml ci.watched_globs, short-circuiting updates when no watched files changed, and ensured prompt builders inherit per-run style/ template overrides without reusing stale instances (docgen/orchestrator.py:68, tests/test_orchestrator.py:214). - Added a GitHub Actions reference workflow plus documentation for self-hosted runners, covering installation, diff-base resolution, and optional committing of README changes (docs/ci/docgen-update.yml:1, docs/ci/github- actions.md:1). - Updated the spec and feature checklist to reflect the new CI integration, style presets, and watched-glob behaviour (spec/spec.md:55, spec/feature_checklist.md:69).

- Enhanced the pipeline to understand project execution paths and infrastructure cues: new entrypoint and pattern analyzers emit run commands/quick‑start hints, the prompt builder weaves them into Features/Quick Start, and the RAG index now caches embeddings incrementally instead of rebuilding from scratch (docgen/analyzers/entrypoints.py, docgen/analyzers/patterns.py, docgen/prompting/builder.py, docgen/rag/indexer.py, docgen/rag/store.py, related tests). - Hardened post-processing and quality gates with badge insertion, local link validation, and README scorecards persisted under .docgen/scorecard.json; updated publisher/config/CLI plumbing adds dry-run support, PR labelling/ updating, and richer template overrides (docs/templates + packs) (docgen/postproc/badges.py, docgen/postproc/links.py, docgen/postproc/scorecard.py, docgen/orchestrator.py, docgen/cli.py, docgen/git/publisher.py, docgen/ config.py, docs/ci/github-actions.md). - Documented and marked off Phases 7 & 8 in the spec/checklist while expanding coverage with new analyzer, postproc, CLI, publisher, and config tests (spec/spec.md, spec/feature_checklist.md, tests/analyzers/ test_entrypoints.py, tests/analyzers/test_patterns.py, tests/postproc/test_postproc.py, tests/test_cli.py, tests/test_config.py, tests/test_orchestrator.py, tests/git/test_publisher.py).
